REVIEW_TITLE: OK update but new animation is just fluff and Bug reportss remain.
REVIEW_TEXT: New message indicator improved! Now make Senders Name BOLD. Bug reportsS: if you open a prior draft it doesn't register as a new draft unless you edit the text and ALL drafts should pin at top of message list! Need drafts folder & ability to pin priority msgs at top. VERY annoying! NEEDS: Drafts Folder settings/msgs BACKUP improve menu to actual material design add 'Mark as Unread' ability background image support better font customization. Then 5*! Paid for Pro excited to see more! Dumped GoSMS!!
FULL_REVIEW_TEXT: OK update but new animation is just fluff and Bug reportss remain. New message indicator improved! Now make Senders Name BOLD. Bug reportsS: if you open a prior draft it doesn't register as a new draft unless you edit the text and ALL drafts should pin at top of message list! Need drafts folder & ability to pin priority msgs at top. VERY annoying! NEEDS: Drafts Folder settings/msgs BACKUP improve menu to actual material design add 'Mark as Unread' ability background image support better font customization. Then 5*! Paid for Pro excited to see more! Dumped GoSMS!!

REVIEW_TEXT: I used to use MT daily on the desktop app and loved it. I have used it for at least 2 years. When my pro subscription is up this year I do not think I will be renewing.

A new version was rolled out and I have never been able to receive 100% of my texts on the web version. It takes up more space on my computer screen and is unreliable. When my pro subscription is up this year I do not think I will be renewing.

REVIEW_TEXT: So far I like it. The number of spam calls have decreased. BUT! Lately spammers are sending out text that are being identified by a partially random email address (i.e. fastcash_[random numbers and letters].[random email doman]. TrueCall cal block the entire email address listed but since they're only partially randomized they continue to pass the filter.
FULL_REVIEW_TEXT: So far I like it. The number of spam calls have decreased. BUT! Lately spammers are sending out text that are being identified by a partially random email address (i.e. fastcash_[random numbers and letters].[random email doman]. TrueCall cal block the entire email address listed but since they're only partially randomized they continue to pass the filter.
